00019 namespace mprace {
00020 
00021 class Driver;
00022 class DMABuffer;
00023 
00031 class DMAEngine {
00032 public:
00036         enum DMAStatus {
00037                 IDLE,   //>** Channel is free
00038                 BUSY,   //>** Channel is in use
00039                 ERROR   //>** An error has ocurred in the channel
00040         };
00041         
00042         virtual ~DMAEngine() {}
00043         
00049         virtual DMAStatus getStatus(const unsigned int channel)=0;
00050 
00056         virtual void reset(const unsigned int channel)=0;
00057 
00068         virtual void host2board(const unsigned int addr, const DMABuffer& buf, const unsigned int count, const unsigned int offset=0, const bool inc=true, const bool lock=true )=0;
00069 
00080         virtual void board2host(const unsigned int addr, DMABuffer& buf, const unsigned int count, const unsigned int offset=0, const bool inc=true, bool lock=true )=0;
00081 
00082 
00088         virtual void fillDescriptorList(DMABuffer& buf)=0;
00089 
00095         virtual void releaseDescriptorList(DMABuffer& buf)=0;
00096 protected:
00101         DMAEngine(Driver& driver) : drv(&driver) { }
00102 
00103         /* Avoid copy constructor, and copy assignment operator */
00104 
00108         DMAEngine(const DMAEngine&) {}
00109 
00113         DMAEngine& operator=(const DMAEngine&) { return *this; }
00114         
00115         Driver *drv;
00116         
00117 }; /* class DMAEngine */
00118 
00119 } /* namespace mprace */
